item.description: Plan your next adventure to the Kuril Islands with our comprehensive travel guide. Discover cultural attractions, natural wonders, hiking and biking routes, activities and tours, food and drink scene, accommodations, souvenir shopping, local customs, safety and health tips, as well as transportation and logistics options.
